div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1805 Susiana, 1958-1959 Burial: c. 138 B.C. Contents: c. 200 AR Eastern imit. Alexander III: 10 tetradr. Antiochus II: 2 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Ti- grim) Seleucus III: 1 tetradr. (unc. mint) Antiochus III: 5 tetradr. (Ecbatana 1, An- tiocheia 2, Laodiceia ad Mare 1, unc. western mint 1 as WSM 877, Nisibis) Seleucus IV: 12 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Ti- grim 4, Susa 5, Ecbatana 1, An- tiocheia 2) Antiochus IV: 22 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim 7, Susa 3, Antiocheia-Charax Spasinou 3, Ecbatana 1, Antiocheia 5, Ace 3) Antiochus V: 5 tetradr. (Antiocheia) Demetrius I: 43 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Ti- grim 5, Susa 9, Antiocheia-Charax Spasinou 3, Ecbatana 3, Antiocheia 22, Tarsus 1) Alexander I Bala: 17 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim 1, Susa 10, Antiocheia-Charax Spasinou 2, Antiocheia 4) Demetrius II: 2 tetradr. (Antiocheia-Cha- rax Spasinou) Kamniskires I, Elymaïs: 1 tetradr. (Susa) Euthydemus I: 1 tetradr. Eucratides I: 2 tetradr. Heliocles: 1 tetradr. Disposition: Copenhagen 31; Paris 6; New York 1; Boston 2 Mørkholm, AArch 1965, pp. 127-56, illus.
